title: Super Metroid Boss Scenario Schema
description: A list of boss fight scenarios, which can each be resolved into an energy requirement

items.title: Scenario Object
items.description: An object that describes one boss fight scenario. For a given item loadout, it can be resolved into a fight duration and an energy requirement.

id.title: Weapon ID
id.description: Numerical identifier for this scenario, unique across the entire game

name.title: Scenario Name
name.description: A name for the scenario, intended to be used as a recognizable ID for customization purposes

boss.title: Boss Name
boss.description: The name of the boss for which this scenario applies. Must match an entry in the bosses/main.json file.

explicitWeapons.title: Explicit Weapons
explicitWeapons.description: A list containing the only weapons that are applicable for this scenario. If this is missing, all non-situational weapons the boss takes damage from are applicable by default.

excludedWeapons.title: Excluded Weapons
excludedWeapons.description: A list containing weapons that are not applicable for this scenario, even though they would normally be based on the value of the explicitWeapons property.

requires.title: Scenario Requirements
requires.description: Equipment, tech, and flag requirements for this boss scenario to even be possible

bossDodgeRate.title: Boss Dodge Rate
bossDodgeRate.description: A value specific to the scenario which indicates a percentage of shots taken by Samus which are expected not to hit. This should be calculated separately from player accuracy values.

attackOpportunityDuration.title: Attack Opportunity Duration
attackOpportunityDuration.description: Serves to indicate that the damage window is broken up into opportunities that last the specified amount of frames.

damageWindows.title: Damage Windows
damageWindows.description: An array of objects that describe how often Samus can hit the boss

items.title: Damage Window Object
items.description: An object that describes a percentage of total fight time where Samus can attack, and the requirements that must be met in order to be able to use it.

name.title: Damage Window Name
name.description: A name for this damage window, intended to be used as a recognizable ID for customization purposes

windowPercent.title: Window Percent
windowPercent.description: An amount of percentage points by which the damage window is widened if the requirements are met

requires.title: Damage Window Requirements
requires.description: Equipment, tech, and flag requirements to use this damage window

incomingDamage.title: Incoming Damage
incomingDamage.description: An array of objects that describe attacks that are expected to hit Samus, unless she meets some requirements

items.title: Incoming Damage Object
items.description: An object that describes one attack that is expected to hit Samus at a specific frequency, unless requirements are met

name.title: Incoming Damage Name
name.description: A name for this incoming damage, intended to be used as a recognizable ID for customization purposes

attack.title: Attack Name
attack.description: The name of the attack that will hit Samus. Should be the name of an attack the boss has.

frequencyFrames.title: Frequency Frames
frequencyFrames.description: Indicates the frequency (in frames) at which Samus is expected to be hit by the attack

avoidingRequires.title: Avoidance Requirements
avoidingRequires.description: Equipment, tech, and flag requirements that are needed to avoid getting hit by the attack

particleFrequencyFrames.title: Particle Frequency Frames
particleFrequencyFrames.description: Indicates the frequency (in frames), at which Samus will destroy a farmable particle spawned by the boss. This has a chance to yield energy drops.
